img_above_text:
Pick up the Fire Bellflower on the left at the bottom of the wooden path before you head toward the Revenants and the vine.
Height of Ember Luojia Fragrant Vine
img_below_text:
Turn back on yourself and go back up the stairs and the path. Turn to the right now and grab the Purple Lingzhi by the tree. This will turn into an enemy, but once you beat it, you'll receive a Purple Lingzhi and Nine-Capped Lingzhi.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(90\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/01/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2890%29.png)

img_summary: The image depicts a dark, eerie forest path with a character approaching a large, twisted tree and several smaller structures in the background. This scene is part of a walkthrough for the game "Woods of Ember." The preceding text suggests the player has just collected a Fire Bellflower and is now heading towards a challenging area with Revenants and a vine. The following text indicates that after this encounter, the player should turn back to collect a Purple Lingzhi, which will transform into an enemy. The image likely serves to visually guide players through this specific part of the game, highlighting the environment and potential threats.
